com.pathfindersdk.creatures

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pathfindersdk.creatures.Creature
      • com.pathfindersdk.creatures.Character

  • public class Character
extends Creature
    This class adds character specific stats on top of creature ones.
